description.str: A spell for the zombie null to try to banish nether monsters.  It's a bug if you have it.
A spell for the nether-void to try to banish nether monsters.  It's a bug if you have it.
Anyone nearby will get stronger.
Cause a monster to get a small number of extra moves.  It's a bug if you have this.
Preps for using Hardened Skin when a hostile target is detected.
Grants the effect for a dragon to use deep breath.
Pattern screamer prepares to hurl a rock with deadly accuracy
Grants the effect for a pattern screamer to throw a rock.
Unleash a shock when touching a target, doing a small amount of damage and dazing them.
Launch a bolt of lightning at a nearby target.
Launch a lightning explosion at a nearby target.
Cause a burst of sparks near a target.  It's a bug if you see this.
Manipulate the nervous system of a corpse, causing it to rise and protect you.  This protection will only last a short time.
This heals the revivified target so it doesn't die basically immediately after rising.  It's a bug if you have it.
This puts a debuff on the revived monster that will make sure it eventually dies.  It's a bug if you have it.
Manipulate the light around you, creating small illusions around your body to become harder to hit.
When you die, you burst apart in an explosion of light.
Applies an effect that makes the target glow, reducing dodge.  It's a bug if you have it.
Applies an effect that makes the target glow, reducing dodge.  It's a bug if you have it.
Concentrate photons into a high-energy beam.
Applies an effect that causes radiation to the target.  It's a bug if you have it.
Create a destructive flash of light.
Cause a burst of flames at the target location.
By strongly exciting the air at a particular point, you produce a burst of light.
Power for monsters to put out flames.

//: It would be nice if there were an 'affect lower' flag for spells, but alas there is not
description: Spray fire in a cone in front of you, if you're a hellhound.

description.str: Power for monsters to make each other immune to fire.
Create an expanding fireball that catches multiple targets in its wake.
Pull a target or set of items to you.  This power is for monster usage
Preps for using Momentum Alteration when a hostile target is detected.
Grants the Momentum Alteration effect to a monster.
Preps for using Inertial Barrier when a hostile target is detected.
Grants the Inertial Barrier effect to a monster.

name.str: Inertial Barrier Monster Improved enemy check

description.str: Preps for using Inertial Barrier when a hostile target is detected.
Grants the Inertial Barrier effect to a monster.
Smash a single target with a fist of telekinetic force.
Create an expanding fireball that catches multiple targets in its wake.
Damages enemies when you use Wrecking Ball on the ground.  If you have this you debugged it in.
Makes sure the target is within range before using Earthshaker
Seize the nearby earth with your powers and *wrench* it, toppling buildings and knocking everyone nearby off their feet.
Destroy furniture and terrain nearby.
Causes rubble to be spawned occasionally.
Disconnect a target's brain from its senses, leaving it blinded and confused.
Causes the player to hallucinate briefly.
By shutting off a target's senses, you can prevent them from seeing anything.
By shutting off a target's senses, you can prevent them from hearing anything.
Short-circuit and overwhelm a target's brain, causing extreme damage or death.  Does not affect targets without working brains.
Reduces the player's speed for a brief period of time and possibly dazes or stuns.
Short-circuit and overwhelm a target's brain, causing extreme damage or death, and instilling an extreme primal fear.  Does not affect targets without working brains.

//: The level scaling with this can get crazy, be especially careful with how high this will go.

description.str: Reduces the player's speed for a brief period of time and possibly dazes or stuns.  An AoE around the monster instead of a single-target effect.
Freezes the player in place briefly.
This spell passes through a bit of damage in case something the PSYSHIELD_PARTIAL flag fails, to simulate the failure.  It's a bug if you have it directly.
Amalgamation whispers into your mind, distracting you.
Causes noise at target location.
AI trigger for only casting when hostiles are present.
Adds the telepathic network effect to the monster's ally.
Manipulate space to increase relative distance around the target, reducing their speed.
Teleport target.
The blink you cast if a riftwalker hits you.  It's a bug if you have it.
Preps for using Reactive Displaccement when a hostile target is detected.
Grants the Reactive Displacement effect to a monster.
Teleports Attackers.
Preps for using Warped Strikes when a hostile target is detected.
Grants the Warped Strikes effect to a monster.
Open a portal to the Nether and summon monsters, if you're also a monster.  This will probably end badly for you but who cares, you're a monster.
Drain Target's Health Mod.  It's a bug if you have it.
Drain Target's Health Mod and reduce healing.  It's a bug if you have it.
Buffs regeneration for a feral vitakinetic.  It's a bug if you have it, and anyway it wouldn't work on you.
You are degenerating.  RIP.

name.str: [Ψ]Degenerating Touch Self From Monster to Monster

description.str: You are degenerating.  RIP.

description: Add the effect to give the hidebehind mindsight.
Add the effect to give the eater mindsight.
